summary: A standalone and simple Follower Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my redguard preset - Savsaaba.

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Frostfruit Inn of Rorikstead (console command "coc roriksteadexterior01" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- loves one handed weapons, but can use other weapons aswell
- won't use shouts, magic and staves
- comes with no armor and weapon (just redguard clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some basic perks that shouldn't be too OP, if it is, please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots: [/b](pics from left to right)

Scoundrel's Armor remastered (RefurbMadness)
Thieves Guild Armor (RefurbMadness)
Revealing Tsun's armor for Sundracon Males (seedye)
Moonlight Assassin Armor from Simple Outfits for Men (RefurbMadness)



I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]

author: Thrwomp
